summary: During WWI, two officers, one a pilot and the other in the navy, compete for the same beautiful young woman.
cast: Joan Crawford|Gary Cooper|Robert Young|Franchot Tone|Roscoe Karns|Louise Closser Hale|Rollo Lloyd|Hilda Vaughn|Gene O'Brien|Ernie Alexander|Jimmy Aubrey|Glen Cavender|Edward Cooper|Murray Kinnell|Eily Malyon|Frank Marlowe|Carlyle Moore Jr.|Bert Moorhouse|David Newell|Ronald R. Rondell|C. Montague Shaw
keywords: screenplay adapted by author|officers club|padre|romantic triangle|war memorial
title: Vivamos hoy
